conceptType.name: wn#Tail
conceptType.creator: http://www.cogsci.princeton.edu/~wn/
conceptType.description: the posterior part of the body of a vertebrate especially when elongated and extending beyond the trunk or main part of the body

conceptType.name: wn#Bobtail
conceptType.creator: http://www.cogsci.princeton.edu/~wn/
conceptType.description: a short or shortened tail of certain animals

conceptType.name: wn#Oxtail
conceptType.creator: http://www.cogsci.princeton.edu/~wn/
conceptType.description: the skinned tail of cattle; used especially for soups

conceptType.name: wn#Fluke_3
conceptType.creator: http://www.cogsci.princeton.edu/~wn/
conceptType.description: either of the two lobes of the tail of a cetacean

conceptType.name: wn#CaudalAppendage
conceptType.creator: http://www.cogsci.princeton.edu/~wn/
conceptType.description: tail especially of a mammal posterior to and above the anus

conceptType.name: wn#Flag_5
conceptType.creator: http://www.cogsci.princeton.edu/~wn/
conceptType.description: a conspicuously marked or shaped tail

conceptType.name: wn#Uropygium
conceptType.creator: http://www.cogsci.princeton.edu/~wn/
conceptType.description: posterior part of a bird's body from which the tail feathers grow
